meanings.definition: One who guards or protects something.
meanings.sent1: The guarder watched over the treasure chest all night.
meanings.sent2: The guarder at the museum ensured no one touched the artifacts.
meanings.sent3: The guarder cat kept a close eye on the house, ready to pounce on any intruders.
meanings.sent4: The guarder of the forest shielded the animals from harm.
meanings.sent5: The guarder's presence made the area feel safe and secure.

meanings.definition: A device or mechanism used for protection or security.
meanings.sent1: The guarder on the door beeped whenever someone approached.
meanings.sent2: The guarder on the window prevented any break-ins.
meanings.sent3: The guarder alarm went off when a squirrel tried to climb in.
meanings.sent4: The guarder around the castle walls kept enemies at bay.
meanings.sent5: The guarder system was state-of-the-art, ensuring maximum safety.
